item.title: Approaching Windows
item.description: Well, hello there! Last few weeks have been a little busy between my mere analog life and pwning industrial ovens work. Lately I have been banging my head against this thing known as Windows. Its APIs to be precise, as I am trying to move out of my comfort zone of “development” (I am by no means a developer, but when I make stuff, it’s usually on Linux). As a side note, while we’re talking about development, I recently decided to produce a rip-off of the amazing xsshunter and write it in Go.
